title: GIGIZAZA Gold Velvet Decorative Throw Pillow Covers,18x18 Pillow Covers for Couch Sofa Bed 2 Pack Soft Cushion Covers
descriptions:
GIGIZAZA Gold Velvet Decorative Throw Pillow Covers (2-Pack)

- What you get: Two pillow covers. Each cover fits a square pillow that is 18 x 18 inches. They can also fit a fluffier 20 x 20 inch insert if you like a fuller look.
- Soft and comfortable: Made from 100% velvet. Gentle on the skin and cozy to lean on.
- Beautiful color: Warm Gold that brightens a room and matches many styles.
- Easy to use: Each cover has a long, hidden zipper. It opens wide, so it’s simple to put the pillow in and take it out.
- Where to use: Perfect for your couch, bed, chair, window seat, office, car, or even a coffee shop corner.
- Easy care: Machine wash on cold. Tumble dry on low. No special treatment needed.

Helpful tips:
- These are covers only. You will need pillow inserts. Choose 18 x 18 inches for standard comfort, or 20 x 20 inches for extra plump pillows.
- The zipper is “invisible,” which means it blends into the fabric for a neat look, but it still opens easily.

If you have questions or suggestions, customer support is available and happy to help. Enjoy a soft, elegant refresh for your home with GIGIZAZA Gold Velvet Pillow Covers.
